forest.willow package¶

Submodules¶

forest.willow.log_stats module¶

forest.willow.log_stats.comm_logs_summaries(ID: str, df_text, df_call, stamp_start, stamp_end, tz_str, option)¶

Docstring Args: Beiwe ID is needed here only for debugging. The other inputs are the outputs from read_comm_logs().

Option is ‘daily’ or ‘hourly’, determining the resolution of the summary stats tz_str: timezone where the study was/is conducted

Return: pandas dataframe of summary stats

forest.willow.log_stats.log_stats_main(study_folder: str, output_folder: str, tz_str: str, option: str, time_start=None, time_end=None, beiwe_id=None)¶
